Prompt:

---
First, I will give you the name of a town or city in the UK, and your task is to write headings, subheadings, and descriptions.

Important: You must add the name that I gave you in the heading, subheading, and description.

Heading: The heading must be one line with three to four keywords.

Example Heading: Welcome to Maldon: Expert Phone Repairs in Ingatestone

Subheading: must be in one line

Example Subheading: Quality Phone Repairs at Competitive Prices in Ingatestone

Description: It must be 450 characters long.

write all output in [TARGETLANGUAGE] The text to summarize is this: [PROMPT]
